Wallet can not read encrypted key; re-import required. Authentication to unlock key not provided or timed out. Please try again. Since this key was created the mobile device security has changed and the OS has invalidated the key. Please re-import your key.
DP QUANTUM COIN WALLET Total Balance
Welcome, info 1 OF 7 Important, Please Read! You are about to create a quantum resistant wallet. Do not send Ethereum or other coins or tokens to this wallet address! Next
Welcome, info 2 OF 7 Anti Virus Make sure that your computer or laptop or device has anti-virus software installed and enabled! Next
Welcome, info 3 OF 7 Passwords Make sure that you use a strong, long password and do not forget it! Next
Welcome, info 4 OF 7 Backups Backup your wallet and keep it safe offline. Keep at least three copies of your wallets in different places offline. Next
Welcome, info 5 OF 7 Wallet Safety Do not share your wallet or passwords with anyone. Scammers often offer to help but will steal your wallet! Next
Welcome, info 6 OF 7 Email Safety Do not reply to or open attachments, links or images in emails that talks about Doge Protocol coins, tokens or wallets. They are most likely scams that can result in your coins and tokens getting stolen! Next
Welcome, info 7 OF 7 Social Media and Messaging Apps Safety Do not respond to social media and messaging app direct-messages from community members or anyone in general talking about Doge Protocol. They are most likely scammers who can trick you and steal your coins or tokens! Next
Safety Quiz 1 OF 2 Coin Type What coins or tokens can you send to this wallet? Ethereum DogeP ERC20 Tokens DP Mainnet Coins All the above Next
Safety Quiz 2 OF 2 Lost wallet or password If you lost your wallet or password, who can help recover? Doge Protocol Community Customer Support Team Dev No one Next

This is correct. You should only send DP Mainnet coins to this wallet.string> That is wrong! Please read the question carefully and try again.
This is correct. No one can help you recover your wallet or password.string> Your answer is wrong! Please read the question carefully and try again.
Set Wallet Password Use a strong and long password. And do not forget it! Password Enter a password Retype Password Retype the password Next
Enter a minimum of 12 characters for password Retype the password correctly
Create or Restore Quantum Wallet Select an option Create New Quantum Wallet Restore A Quantum Wallet From Seed Words Restore A Quantum Wallet From a Backup File Next
Seed Words 1.Ensure that no one is looking at the screen other than you. 2.Ensure that there is no camera pointed at this screen, including from your phone. 3.You should save the seed words safely offline and keep multiple copies in a trustworthy and safe location. 4.If these seed words are stolen or someone else gets access to them, your wallet is compromised. 5.Click here to reveal the seed words.
Seed Words
A1 A2 A3 A4
Import Wallet You can import only Doge Protocol Testnet wallet. Do not import your Ethereum or DogeP token or other wallets! Password Enter the wallet password Select a wallet file Import
Password should be minimum 16 characters in length!
Export Wallet Export your wallet file. Please make sure that you keep at least three copies in different devices offline! Export Skip & Continue to wallet
Testnet Coins Would you like to get some testnet coins to try out? It can take upto 5 minutes to get these coins. Request Coins Skip
